answers.answer: Well one the child could be irritating the wounds during the day. But given the age and everything, I'm not sure of that. Does the child have diabetes or anything like that? That could be causing it.

question: I don't even know if this is the correct place for me to be but my 2 year old has many health issues one that i need to know about is she has several cuts and wounds on her knees and feet that will not heal it has been months of cleaning them and bandaging then and nothing helps they are worse still
title: wounds won't heal
